theLastLightMod:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

theLastLightMod:WitherPower.NAME: Wither
DESCRIPTIONS: While #yWither is applied, Weak, Vulnerable, and Poison will not decrease.

theLastLightMod:SappingWindsPower.NAME: Sapping Winds
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #b

theLastLightMod:CorrosionPower.NAME: Corrosion
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of their turn, enemies lose HP equal to their #yWither stacks

theLastLightMod:DeathTouchedPower.NAME: Death Touched
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply
